hero.headline: Transform Your Outdoor Space with Russell's
hero.subhead: Expert landscaping services in Salem, OR. From design to maintenance, we bring your vision to life.

features.title: Custom Landscape Design
features.description: We create stunning, personalized landscape designs tailored to your property and lifestyle.

features.title: Professional Lawn Care
features.description: Keep your lawn healthy and vibrant with our expert mowing, fertilization, and weed control services.

features.title: Hardscaping & Construction
features.description: Enhance your outdoor living space with patios, walkways, retaining walls, and other hardscaping features.

reviews.name: Sarah M.
reviews.text: Russell's Landscape Services completely transformed our backyard! They listened to our ideas and created a beautiful, functional space that we love. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: John B.
reviews.text: We've been using Russell's for our lawn care for years and are always impressed with their professionalism and attention to detail. Our lawn has never looked better!

reviews.name: Emily K.
reviews.text: Excellent service! Russell's team was punctual, efficient, and did a fantastic job installing our new patio. We couldn't be happier with the results.
